name: Stahlregen - Do the Wave (V2 minimal - PS2 blur)

shapecode_3_a2=0.000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = .5*sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=wave_b = .8;
per_frame_3=wave_g = .5+.2*sin(time*2);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=mv_b = wave_r*0.7;
per_frame_7=mv_g = wave_b*0.7;
per_frame_8=mv_r = wave_g*0.7;
per_pixel_1=
per_pixel_2=bbox = above(x,.4+.1*bass_att)*below(x,.4+.3*bass_att)
per_pixel_3=+ above(1-x,.4+.1*bass_att)*below(1-x,.4+.3*bass_att);
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=tbox = above(x,.4+.1*treb_att)*below(x,.4+.3*treb_att)
per_pixel_6=+ above(1-x,.4+.1*treb_att)*below(1-x,.4+.3*treb_att);
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=sx = 1.02-.05*sin(0.0751*time)*tbox+.04*cos(0.0751*time)*(1-tbox);
per_pixel_9=sy = 1.02+.05*sin(0.0523*time)*bbox-.04*cos(0.0523*time)*(1-bbox);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`ret += max(
warp_8=`max(GetPixel(uv+float2(1.5,0)*texsize.wz),GetPixel(uv-float2(1.5,0)*texsize.wz)),
warp_9=`max(GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1.5)*texsize.wz),GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1.5)*texsize.wz)));
warp_10=`ret -= GetPixel(uv);
warp_11=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_12=`ret = ret*.94-.003; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_13=`}
